CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.EDW_VW_LA_GT_ROUTE (		--// CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.edw_vw_la_gt_route (
    route_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    store_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    route_no varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    distributor_id varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    ship_to varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    contact_person varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    route_name varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    route_desc varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    is_active varchar(5),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sales_rep_id varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    route_code varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    route_code_desc varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    valid_flag varchar(1),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    route_detail_flag varchar(5),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    effective_start_date date,		--//  ENCODE raw
    effective_end_date date		--//  ENCODE raw
)
;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.EDW_VW_RPT_LCM_GT_SCORECARD (		--// CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.edw_vw_rpt_lcm_gt_scorecard (
    identifier varchar(9),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    cntry_cd varchar(3),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    crncy_cd varchar(3),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    cntry_nm varchar(8),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    year_month varchar(14),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    year numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    month numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    distributor_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    retail_env varchar(300),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    salesarea varchar(406),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sell_out numeric(38,11),		--//  ENCODE raw
    gross_sell_out numeric(38,12),		--//  ENCODE raw
    net_sell_out numeric(38,11),		--//  ENCODE raw
    sellout_target numeric(38,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    planned_call_count numeric(38,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // bigint
    visited_call_count numeric(38,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // bigint
    effective_call_count numeric(38,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // bigint
    coverage_stores_count numeric(38,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // bigint
    reactivate_stores_count varchar(1),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    inactive_stores_count varchar(1),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sales_order_count numeric(38,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // bigint
    on_time_count numeric(38,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // bigint
    in_full_count numeric(38,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // bigint
    otif_count numeric(38,0)		--//  ENCODE raw // bigint
)
;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPASPEDW_INTEGRATION.EDW_VW_SFMC_CHILDREN_DATA (		--// CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPASPEDW_INTEGRATION.edw_vw_sfmc_children_data (
    country_code varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    parent_key varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    child_name varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    child_birth_month varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    child_birth_year varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    child_gender varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    child_number varchar(30)		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
)
;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPASPEDW_INTEGRATION.EDW_VW_SFMC_CONSUMER_MASTER (		--// CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPASPEDW_INTEGRATION.edw_vw_sfmc_consumer_master (
    country_code varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    first_name varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    last_name varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    mobile_number varchar(30),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    mobile_country_code varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    birth_month varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    birth_year varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    address_1 varchar(255),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    address_2 varchar(255),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    address_city varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    address_zipcode varchar(30),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    subscriber_key varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    website_unique_id varchar(150),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    source varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    medium varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    brand varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    address_country varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    campaign_id varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    created_date timestamp without time zone,		--//  ENCODE raw
    updated_date timestamp without time zone,		--//  ENCODE raw
    unsubscribe_date timestamp without time zone,		--//  ENCODE raw
    email varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    full_name varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    last_logon_time timestamp without time zone,		--//  ENCODE raw
    remaining_points numeric(10,4),		--//  ENCODE raw
    redeemed_points numeric(10,4),		--//  ENCODE raw
    total_points numeric(10,4),		--//  ENCODE raw
    gender varchar(20),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    line_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    line_name varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    line_email varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    line_channel_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    address_region varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    tier varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    opt_in_for_communication varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    crtd_dttm timestamp without time zone,		--//  ENCODE raw
    have_kid varchar(20),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    age numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    smoker varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    expectant_mother varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    category_they_are_using varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    category_they_are_using_eng varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    skin_condition varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    skin_condition_eng varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    skin_problem varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    skin_problem_eng varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    use_mouthwash varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    mouthwash_time varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    mouthwash_time_eng varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    why_not_use_mouthwash varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    why_not_use_mouthwash_eng varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    oral_problem varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    oral_problem_eng varchar(200)		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
)
;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPASPEDW_INTEGRATION.EDW_VW_SFMC_EMAIL_ACTIVITY_FACT (		--// CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPASPEDW_INTEGRATION.edw_vw_sfmc_email_activity_fact (
    activity_type varchar(11),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    country_key varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    subscriber_key varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    job_id varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    activity_date timestamp without time zone,		--//  ENCODE raw
    local_timezone_activity_date timestamp without time zone,		--//  ENCODE raw
    sent_activity_date timestamp without time zone,		--//  ENCODE raw
    email_id varchar(30),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    email_name varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    email_subject varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sent_email_name varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sent_email_subject varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    email_delivered_flag varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    is_unique varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    url varchar(1000),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    link_name varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    link_content varchar(1000),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    bounce_reason varchar(30),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    bounce_type varchar(30),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    bounce_description varchar(1000)		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
)
;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.EDW_VW_TH_SELLOUT_SALES_FOC_FACT (		--// CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.edw_vw_th_sellout_sales_foc_fact (
    cntry_cd varchar(2),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    cntry_nm varchar(8),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying

    dstrbtr_soldto_code varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying

    dstrbtr_matl_num varchar(25),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying

    product_name2 varchar(500),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sap_matl_num varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    bar_cd varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    bill_date timestamp without time zone,		--//  ENCODE raw
    order_no varchar(255),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    iscancel numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    grp_cd varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    prom_cd1 varchar(255),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    prom_cd2 varchar(255),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    prom_cd3 varchar(255),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    bill_doc varchar(255),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    slsmn_cd varchar(150),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    slsmn_nm varchar(250),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    wh_id varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    doc_type varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    doc_type_desc varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    base_sls numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    sls_qty numeric(19,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    ret_qty numeric(19,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    uom varchar(2),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sls_qty_pc numeric(22,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    ret_qty_pc numeric(22,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    grs_trd_sls numeric(38,12),		--//  ENCODE raw
    ret_val numeric(38,12),		--//  ENCODE raw
    trd_discnt numeric(20,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    trd_discnt_item_lvl numeric(19,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    grs_prc numeric(19,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    trd_discnt_bill_lvl numeric(19,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    trd_sls numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    net_trd_sls numeric(19,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    tot_bf_discount numeric(19,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    cn_reason_cd varchar(255),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    cn_reason_desc varchar(250),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    jj_grs_trd_sls numeric(38,12),		--//  ENCODE raw
    jj_ret_val numeric(38,12),		--//  ENCODE raw
    jj_trd_sls numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    jj_net_trd_sls numeric(19,6),		--//  ENCODE raw
    gross_sales numeric(19,6)		--//  ENCODE raw
)
;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPASPEDW_INTEGRATION.EDW_VW_TH_SFMC_ANALYSIS (		--// CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPASPEDW_INTEGRATION.edw_vw_th_sfmc_analysis (

    invoicec_created_date varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying

    last_name varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying

    mobile_number varchar(30),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    subscriber_key varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    mobile_country_code varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    address_country varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    address_region varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    address_1 varchar(255),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    address_2 varchar(255),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying

    birth_month varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    birth_year varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    consumer_age varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    consumer_age_group varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    email varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    gender varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    channel_name varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    brand varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    product_name varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    product_category varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    tier varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    remaining_points numeric(10,4),		--//  ENCODE raw
    customer_redeemed_points numeric(10,4),		--//  ENCODE raw
    total_points numeric(10,4),		--//  ENCODE raw
    invoive_number varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    invoice_qty varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying

    invoice_seller_name varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    invoice_points varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    invoice_status varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying

    child_birth_month varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    child_birth_year varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    child_gender varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    child_number varchar(30),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    child_age varchar(21),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    child_group varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    child_flag varchar(12),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    redeemed_order_number varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    redeemed_prod_name varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    redemption_status varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    redeemed_points varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    redeemed_qty varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    activity_date timestamp without time zone,		--//  ENCODE raw
    local_activity_date timestamp without time zone,		--//  ENCODE raw
    sent_activity_date timestamp without time zone,		--//  ENCODE raw
    email_name varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    email_subject varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sent_email_name varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sent_email_subject varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    email_delivered_flag varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    is_unique varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    url varchar(1000),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    link_name varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    link_content varchar(1000),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    bounce_reason varchar(30),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    bounce_type varchar(30),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    bounce_description varchar(1000),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    data_refresh_time timestamp without time zone,		--//  ENCODE raw
    smoker varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    expectant_mother varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    category_they_are_using varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    category_they_are_using_eng varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    skin_condition varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    skin_condition_eng varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    skin_problem varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    skin_problem_eng varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    use_mouthwash varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    mouthwash_time varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    mouthwash_time_eng varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    why_not_use_mouthwash varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    why_not_use_mouthwash_eng varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    oral_problem varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    oral_problem_eng varchar(200)		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
)
;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPASPEDW_INTEGRATION.VW_EDW_REG_EXCH_RATE (		--// CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPASPEDW_INTEGRATION.vw_edw_reg_exch_rate (
    cntry_key varchar(2),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying

    from_ccy varchar(5),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying

    to_ratio numeric(9,0),		--//  ENCODE raw

)
;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.VW_EDW_TH_MT_INVENTORY (		--// CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.vw_edw_th_mt_inventory (

    inventory_value numeric(38,4),		--//  ENCODE raw
    foc_product varchar(1)		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
)
;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.VW_EDW_TH_MT_SELLOUT (		--// CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.vw_edw_th_mt_sellout (

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.VW_RPT_TH_GT_SCORECARD (		--// CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.vw_rpt_th_gt_scorecard (

    reactivate_stores_count numeric(38,0),		--//  ENCODE raw
    inactive_stores_count numeric(38,0),		--//  ENCODE raw

)
;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;
